definition: gonococcus/Neisseria gonorrhoeae, the pathogen causing gonorrhea

pinyin: pu2 tao2 qiu2 jun1 chang2 du2 su4

sentences.english: Conclusion Gram positive organisms are major pathogens of bacteremia in critically ill patients.
sentences.chinese: 結論革蘭陽性球菌是危重病患者菌血症的重要致病菌。

sentences.english: When it comes to decay, Streptococcus mutans is the bacterial strain that does the most damage.
sentences.chinese: 當發生齲齒，鏈球菌在破壞中起到主要作用。

sentences.english: Distribution and ratio of enterococcus species among different animals were different.
sentences.chinese: 不同動物消化道腸球菌種的分佈不同，比例各異。

sentences.english: Grampositive cocci were highly sensitive to the antimicrobial agents of glycopeptide and linezolid.
sentences.chinese: 糖肽類和利奈唑胺抗菌藥物對革蘭陽性球菌高度敏感。

sentences.english: After in hospital, inspects discovered that what the baby contracts is the pneumococcal bronchopneumonia.
sentences.chinese: 入院後檢查發現寶寶患的是肺炎球菌性支氣管肺炎。

sentences.english: The results of drug-fast showed that tolerance of Streptococcus faecium was higher than that of Streptococcus faecalis.
sentences.chinese: 藥敏結果顯示屎腸球菌的耐藥性高於糞腸球菌。

sentences.english: The results of drug-fast showed that tolerance of Streptococcus faecium was higher than that of Streptococcus faecalis.
sentences.chinese: 藥敏結果顯示屎腸球菌的耐藥性高於糞腸球菌。

sentences.english: When checking purulent fluid, can search inside the cell see diplococcus of negative of coloring of change orchid family name.
sentences.chinese: 檢查膿液時，在細胞內可找見革蘭氏染色陰性雙球菌。

sentences.english: Of the 14.5 million pneumococcal cases, 95% were attributable to pneumonia.
sentences.chinese: 95%的鏈球菌疾病可歸因於肺炎。

sentences.english: Deep skin infections were associated with staphylococcal meningitis in infancy.
sentences.chinese: 深部的皮膚感染在嬰兒期易並有葡萄球菌腦膜炎。

sentences.english: None of the coats was contaminated with VRE.
sentences.chinese: 抗萬古黴素腸球菌的大衣沒有被污染。

sentences.english: The gonococcus and meningococcus, for example, are coffee-bean shaped.
sentences.chinese: 例如，淋球菌和腦膜炎球菌都呈咖啡豆形。

sentences.english: The gonococcus and meningococcus, for example, are coffee-bean shaped.
sentences.chinese: 例如，淋球菌和腦膜炎球菌都呈咖啡豆形。

sentences.english: Objective: Study on characteristics and function for Entercoccus faecium viable bacteria preparations.
sentences.chinese: 對屎腸球菌活菌製劑的特性及功效進行研究和分析。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the prevention and control measures of the pig streptococcus disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討人豬鏈球菌病的防治措施。

sentences.english: Conclusion The Yutian Kechuan capsule has certain of antibacterial effects on staphylococcus aureus.
sentences.chinese: 結論蝓天克喘膠囊對金黃色葡萄球菌有一定抗菌作用。

definition: Gram negative (bacteria that do not retain Gram stain, often the more dangerous kind)
gonococcus/Neisseria gonorrhoeae, the pathogen causing gonorrhea
Mr Gram/Dr. Hans Christian Jaochim Gram (1953-1938), Danish doctor and inventor of the Gram stain 革蘭氏染色法|革兰氏染色法
